          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_54172a34df7d30b8dcd3905004e2be0c6d56a4a5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electric motor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromotor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moteur électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Motor elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Motore elettrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική μηχανή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Motor eléctrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the repulsion between the  permanent magnets and the electromagnet makes the armature turn, making the electric motor work.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">axle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric motor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">permanent magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Abstossung 
zwischen den permanenten Magneten und dem Elektromagneten die Armatur 
sich drehen läßt und läßt den Elektromotor arbeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment la répulsion 
entre les aimants permanents et l'électro-aimant fait l'armature 
tourner, faisant fonctionner le moteur électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o repulsion entre 
os ímãs permanentes e o eletroímã faz a armadura girar, fazendo o 
motor elétrico trabalhar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come la repulsione 
fra i magneti permanente e l'elettromagnete fa l'armatura girare, 
facendo funzionare il motore elettrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η απέχθεια μεταξύ 
των μόνιμων μαγνητών και του ηλεκτρομαγνήτη κάνει armature να 
γυρίσει, κάνοντας την εργασία ηλεκτρικών μηχανών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la repulsión 
entre los imanes permanentes y el electroimán hace la armadura da 
vuelta, haciendo que el motor eléctrico trabaja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welle</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell</string>
          </keyword>
